alert.note: Alert for Allegan; Mason; Muskegon; Oceana; Ottawa; Van Buren (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lakeshore Flood Advisory issued December 15 at 10:55AM EST until December 16 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...LAKESHORE FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Minor beach erosion is expected. * WHERE...Mason, Oceana, Muskegon, Ottawa, Allegan and Van Buren counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 10 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Parking lots and roads along the immediate lakeshore will experience minor flooding. Minor erosion of beaches and sand dunes is expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The primary issue here is the erosion aspect of this storm. Water levels have lowered enough over the past year so that significant flooding from high water is not exepected. However the 10 to 15 foot waves likely will cause some erosion issues.
info.instruction: A Lakeshore Flood Advisory indicates that onshore winds will generate flooding of low areas along the lakeshore. Some minor beach and dune erosion is also likely.

area.areaDesc: Allegan; Mason; Muskegon; Oceana; Ottawa; Van Buren
